name: Entrevista Infernal
description:
A comic-dark game where Grim, the main character, literally fights for a job as Angel of Death. Once the game was originally designed for arcade, where originally would be controlled by two joysticks, one for movement and one for combat melee, ranged and utility skills, it may be a little clunky for PC players. Voices in PT-BR.  

RPG game made for arcade

WASD -> left joystick : Movement

←↓↑→ arrows -> right joystick  : Attacks

f -> Blue button : SlowTime mechanics

y -> black button : Return to menu
